definition: lit. short-lived cicada does not know the seasons; fig. to see only a small piece of the big picture
pinyin: hui4 gu1 bu4 zhi1 chun1 qiu1

definition: Platypleura kaempferi, a kind of cicada
a summer insect cannot discuss ice (idiom)
pinyin: xia4 chong2 bu4 ke3 yi3 yu3 bing1

definition: lit. born in the morning and dying at dusk (idiom)/fig. ephemeral/transient
tyrannical government is fiercer than a tiger (idiom)
(classical particle similar to 於|于[yu2]) in/at/from/because/than/(classical final particle similar to 嗎|吗[ma5], 吧[ba5], 呢[ne5], expressing question, doubt or astonishment)
human life as the morning dew (idiom); fig. ephemeral and precarious nature of human existence
classical final particle, similar to modern 了[le5]
courtesy name for Confucius 孔夫子[Kong3 fu1 zi3]
far and deep/remote and obscure/see also 杳然[yao3 ran2]
light as a goose feather (idiom); trifling/unimportant
can be compared to/is the same as
